verses.text: \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, how are they \w increased|strong="H7231"\w* that \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w* me! \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \add are\add* they that rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \add there be\add* which \w say|strong="H0559"\w* of my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \add There is\add* no \w help|strong="H3444"\w* for him in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

But thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add art\add* a \w shield|strong="H4043"\w* for me; my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*, and the lifter \w up|strong="H7311"\w* of mine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 3.3 \ft for: or, about\f*

I \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and he \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* me out of his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
I laid me \w down|strong="H7901"\w* and \w slept|strong="H3462"\w*; I \w awaked|strong="H6974"\w*; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sustained|strong="H5564"\w* me.

I will not be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of ten \w thousands|strong="H7233"\w* of \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that have \w set|strong="H7896"\w* \add themselves\add* against me round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for thou hast \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* all mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \add upon\add* the cheek \w bone|strong="H3895"\w*; thou hast \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* of the \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*.

\w Salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \add belongeth\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: thy \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \add is\add* upon thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
